1: וַיְהִ֣י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>there was</n> הַיּ֔וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>Again there was a day</n> וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> בְּנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>when the sons</n> הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> לְהִתְיַצֵּ֖ב <sup>3320 </sup> <n>to present</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>before</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>themselves before the LORD</n> וַיָּב֤וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>came</n> גַֽם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> הַשָּׂטָן֙ <sup>7854 </sup> <n>and Satan</n> בְּתֹכָ֔ם <sup>8432 </sup> <n>also among</n> לְהִתְיַצֵּ֖ב <sup>3320 </sup> <n>them to present</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>before</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>himself before the LORD</n>
2: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And the LORD</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַשָּׂטָ֔ן <sup>7854 </sup> <n>unto Satan</n> אֵ֥י <sup>335 </sup> <n>From whence</n> מִזֶּ֖ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>have you</n> תָּבֹ֑א <sup>935 </sup> <n>comest</n> וַיַּ֨עַן <sup>6030 </sup> <n>answered</n> הַשָּׂטָ֤ן <sup>7854 </sup> <n>thou? And Satan</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> מִשֻּׁ֣ט <sup>7751 </sup> <n>From going to and fro</n> בָּאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the earth</n> וּמֵהִתְהַלֵּ֖ךְ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>and from walking up and down</n> בָּֽהּ׃
3: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יְהוָ֜ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>And the LORD</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַשָּׂטָ֗ן <sup>7854 </sup> <n>unto Satan</n> הֲשַׂ֣מְתָּ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>Hast thou</n> לִבְּךָ֮ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>considered</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> עַבְדִּ֣י <sup>5650 </sup> <n>my servant</n> אִיּוֹב֒ <sup>347 </sup> <n>Job</n> כִּי֩ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אֵ֨ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>is no</n> כָּמֹ֜הוּ <sup>3644 </sup> <n>like</n> בָּאָ֗רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>that [there is] none like him in the earth</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> תָּ֧ם <sup>8535 </sup> <n>a perfect</n> וְיָשָׁ֛ר <sup>3477 </sup> <n>and an upright</n> יְרֵ֥א <sup>3373 </sup> <n>one that feareth</n> אֱלֹהִ֖ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> וְסָ֣ר <sup>5493 </sup> <n>and escheweth</n> מֵרָ֑ע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>evil</n> וְעֹדֶ֙נּוּ֙ <sup>5750 </sup> <n>still</n> מַחֲזִ֣יק <sup>2388 </sup> <n>holds</n> בְּתֻמָּת֔וֹ <sup>8538 </sup> <n>his integrity</n> וַתְּסִיתֵ֥נִי <sup>5496 </sup> <n>although thou movedst</n> ב֖וֹ לְבַלְּע֥וֹ <sup>1104 </sup> <n>me against him to destroy</n> חִנָּֽם׃ <sup>2600 </sup> <n>him without cause</n>
4: וַיַּ֧עַן <sup>6030 </sup> <n>answered</n> הַשָּׂטָ֛ן <sup>7854 </sup> <n>And Satan</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and said</n> ע֣וֹר <sup>5785 </sup> <n>Skin</n> בְּעַד־ <sup>1157 </sup> <n>for</n> ע֗וֹר <sup>5785 </sup> <n>for skin</n> וְכֹל֙ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>that</n> לָאִ֔ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>yea all that a man</n> יִתֵּ֖ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>hath will he give</n> בְּעַ֥ד <sup>1157 </sup> <n>for</n> נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>for his life</n>
5: אוּלָם֙ <sup>199 </sup> <n>But</n> שְֽׁלַֽח־ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>put forth</n> נָ֣א <sup>4994 </sup> <n>now</n> יָֽדְךָ֔ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>thine hand</n> וְגַ֥ע <sup>5060 </sup> <n>now and touch</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> עַצְמ֖וֹ <sup>6106 </sup> <n>his bone</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>and</n> בְּשָׂר֑וֹ <sup>1320 </sup> <n>and his flesh</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>lo</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> פָּנֶ֖יךָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>thee to thy face</n> יְבָרֲכֶֽךָּ׃ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>and he will curse</n>
6: וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> יְהוָ֛ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> הַשָּׂטָ֖ן <sup>7854 </sup> <n>unto Satan</n> הִנּ֣וֹ <sup>2005 </sup> <n>behold</n> בְיָדֶ֑ךָ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>Behold he [is] in thine hand</n> אַ֖ךְ <sup>389 </sup> <n>only</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נַפְשׁ֥וֹ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>his life</n> שְׁמֹֽר׃ <sup>8104 </sup> <n>but save</n>
7: וַיֵּצֵא֙ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>forth</n> הַשָּׂטָ֔ן <sup>7854 </sup> <n>Satan</n> מֵאֵ֖ת <sup>853 </sup> פְּנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>from the presence</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> וַיַּ֤ךְ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>and smote</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אִיּוֹב֙ <sup>347 </sup> <n>Job</n> בִּשְׁחִ֣ין <sup>7822 </sup> <n>boils</n> רָ֔ע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>with sore</n> מִכַּ֥ף <sup>3709 </sup> <n>from the sole</n> רַגְל֖וֹ <sup>7272 </sup> <n>of his foot</n> [עַד כ] (וְעַ֥ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> ק) קָדְקֳדֽוֹ׃ <sup>6936 </sup> <n>unto his crown</n>

10: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>But he said</n> אֵלֶ֗יהָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to her</n> כְּדַבֵּ֞ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>unto her Thou speakest</n> אַחַ֤ת <sup>259 </sup> <n>as one</n> הַנְּבָלוֹת֙ <sup>5036 </sup> <n>of the foolish women</n> תְּדַבֵּ֔רִי <sup>1696 </sup> <n>speaketh</n> גַּ֣ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>indeed</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַטּ֗וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>good</n> נְקַבֵּל֙ <sup>6901 </sup> <n>and shall we not receive</n> מֵאֵ֣ת <sup>853 </sup> הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>at the hand of God</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָרָ֖ע <sup>7451 </sup> <n>adversity</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and not</n> נְקַבֵּ֑ל <sup>6901 </sup> <n>accept</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all manner</n> זֹ֛את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> חָטָ֥א <sup>2398 </sup> <n>sin</n> אִיּ֖וֹב <sup>347 </sup> <n>Job</n> בִּשְׂפָתָֽיו׃ <sup>8193 </sup> <n>with his lips</n> פ
11: וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֞וּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>heard</n> שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת ׀ <sup>7969 </sup> <n>three</n> רֵעֵ֣י <sup>7453 </sup> <n>friends</n> אִיּ֗וֹב <sup>347 </sup> <n>Now when Job's</n> אֵ֣ת <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of all</n> הָרָעָ֣ה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>of all this evil</n> הַזֹּאת֮ <sup>2063 </sup> <n>that</n> הַבָּ֣אָה <sup>935 </sup> <n>that was come</n> עָלָיו֒ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>upon him they came</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every one</n> מִמְּקֹמ֔וֹ <sup>4725 </sup> <n>from his own place</n> אֱלִיפַ֤ז <sup>464 </sup> <n>Eliphaz</n> הַתֵּימָנִי֙ <sup>8489 </sup> <n>the Temanite</n> וּבִלְדַּ֣ד <sup>1085 </sup> <n>and Bildad</n> הַשּׁוּחִ֔י <sup>7747 </sup> <n>the Shuhite</n> וְצוֹפַ֖ר <sup>6691 </sup> <n>and Zophar</n> הַנַּֽעֲמָתִ֑י <sup>5284 </sup> <n>the Naamathite</n> וַיִּוָּעֲד֣וּ <sup>3259 </sup> <n>for they had made an appointment</n> יַחְדָּ֔ו <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n> לָב֥וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>to come</n> לָנֽוּד־ <sup>5110 </sup> <n>to mourn</n> ל֖וֹ וּֽלְנַחֲמֽוֹ׃ <sup>5162 </sup> <n>with him and to comfort</n>
12: וַיִּשְׂא֨וּ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>And when they lifted up</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עֵינֵיהֶ֤ם <sup>5869 </sup> <n>their eyes</n> מֵרָחוֹק֙ <sup>7350 </sup> <n>afar off</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and did not</n> הִכִּירֻ֔הוּ <sup>5234 </sup> <n>and knew</n> וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>him not they lifted up</n> קוֹלָ֖ם <sup>6963 </sup> <n>their voice</n> וַיִּבְכּ֑וּ <sup>1058 </sup> <n>and wept</n> וַֽיִּקְרְעוּ֙ <sup>7167 </sup> <n>and they rent</n> אִ֣ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>every one</n> מְעִל֔וֹ <sup>4598 </sup> <n>his mantle</n> וַיִּזְרְק֥וּ <sup>2236 </sup> <n>and sprinkled</n> עָפָ֛ר <sup>6083 </sup> <n>dust</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> רָאשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <sup>7218 </sup> <n>upon their heads</n> הַשָּׁמָֽיְמָה׃ <sup>8064 </sup> <n>toward heaven</n>
13: וַיֵּשְׁב֤וּ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>So they sat down</n> אִתּוֹ֙ <sup>854 </sup> <n>on</n> לָאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>with him upon the ground</n> שִׁבְעַ֥ת <sup>7651 </sup> <n>seven</n> יָמִ֖ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>days</n> וְשִׁבְעַ֣ת <sup>7651 </sup> <n>and seven</n> לֵיל֑וֹת <sup>3915 </sup> <n>nights</n> וְאֵין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>no</n> דֹּבֵ֤ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>and none spake</n> אֵלָיו֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> דָּבָ֔ר <sup>1697 </sup> <n>a word</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> רָא֔וּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>unto him for they saw</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> גָדַ֥ל <sup>1431 </sup> <n>great</n> הַכְּאֵ֖ב <sup>3511 </sup> <n>that [his] grief</n> מְאֹֽד׃ <sup>3966 </sup> <n>was very</n>
